description: An Irish take on a classically Italian dessert.
name: Irish Cream Tiramisu Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium egg, separate yolks and whites
0.3-plus 1 tsp cup espresso coffee, strong coffee and cooled

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the espresso with the kahlua and set to one side.
In a mixing bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff and slowly add the sugar and egg yolks whole still mixing.
Add the cheese and Irish cream and fold until fully combined.
Now at the base of your serving dish place some of the sponge, drizzle some coffe mix, then add some cheese mix.
Repeat the above layering process again on top of each and then garnish with chocolate shards. Allow to set and cool in teh firdge 2 hours before serving.
